description.value:
You unleash the ultimate in destructive magic; Ultima. The effects of Ultima depend on the level of each target being hit. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by Ultima is immediately slain, and the body is reduced to ash. Drained conditions inflicted by Ultima are laced with pure magic, and do not decrease when you get a full night's rest; only cleansing magic from powerful sources can cleanse it.

  • 14th or Lower The target dies instantly.

  • 15th or Highter The target take 25d12 unaspected damage, which ignores all resistances and immunities to unaspected damage and must attempt a Reflex save.

Critical Success The target takes half damage.

Success The target takes full damage.

Failure The target takes full damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 4}.
